item.description:
I'm cross-posting this event from Facebook.  It's hosted by the "Liberty Drinks Boston" group, which I only learned of recently.

Here's the Facebook event: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=114024825344277

And the description...

Hello Liberty Folks,
We've dug ourselves out of the snow and are ready to get our drink-on for the summer! Join us Wednesday night April 13 at the Beantown Pub in downtown Boston for drinks and food while we discuss finishing our taxes, the theartrical release of Atlas Shrugged and events planned for the summer. Given the way things are going there's a lot of drinking to do!
Call for Volunteers 4/15-4/17: we've been asked by the Free State Project to participate in a flyer promotion at the Atlas Shrugged opening the weekend following this Happy Hour. More details will be posted here otherwise message us, post a question or come to the vent for details. You will get a free tshirt out of helping!
http://www.atlasshruggedpart1.com/
http://freestateproject.org/
http://www.beantownpub.com/
Parking or Public Transport Metered street parking until 8pm or parking around Common/Public Garden. Near Park Street Station (and also Downtown Crossing).
ABOUT LIBERTY DRINKS BOSTON (Like us!!)
To gather liberty-loving individuals of all persuasions in the pubs, bars and restaurants of Boston and keep the conversation going. http://www.facebook.com/liberty.drinks.boston
item.why: Cross-posting an event from Facebook, hosted by the "Liberty Drinks Boston" group.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty Drinks Boston April Happy Hour
